snippet: Detroit’s Jhonny Peralta has five hits and three run-saving plays in the first two games of the A.L.C.S.
abstract: Detroit Tigers shortstop Jhonny Peralta has five hits and three run-saving plays in first two games of ALCS against New York Yankees.
lead_paragraph: Detroit’s Jhonny Peralta has five hits and three run-saving plays in the first two games of the A.L.C.S.

headline.main: Peralta, the Other Shortstop, Shows Off Hands and Hitting
headline.print_headline: Peralta, the Other Shortstop, Shows Off Hands and Hitting
